leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-系统发育与进化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 比对→建树→模型选择→比较分析→可视化

unit.coverage_tools: learned models、辅助推断、表示学习

queries: [WEB] deep learning for phylogenetic inference github
[WEB] machine learning evolutionary tree reconstruction github
[WEB] graph neural networks for phylogenetics github

tools.name: TREE
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretable identification of cancer genes via transformer-powered graph learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework utilizing transformers and graph representation learning to identify cancer genes across biological networks in an interpretable manner.

tools.name: BioNeuralNet
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for analyzing biological data via graph construction and embedding
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for analyzing biological data by constructing graphs, clustering, and generating embeddings to power downstream tasks like disease prediction and biomarker discovery.

tools.name: Nbed
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum simulation qubit reduction via DFT embedding
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to reduce the qubit requirements of quantum simulation by embedding the problem into Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations.

tools.name: Ouroboros
tools.one_line_profile: Directed chemical evolution model for molecular encoding in drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A foundational model bridging representation learning and generative AI to perform directed chemical evolution via navigating molecular encoding space for drug discovery.

tools.name: PhyloDeep
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for phylogenetic parameter estimation and model selection
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for parameter estimation and model selection from phylogenetic trees using deep learning techniques.

tools.name: Phyloformer
tools.one_line_profile: Fast phylogeny estimation using self-attention networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool utilizing self-attention networks (transformers) for fast and accurate phylogenetic tree estimation.

tools.name: DiffEvolTreeSearch
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable phylogenetic tree construction without prior training data
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable approach to phylogenetic tree construction that optimizes tree and ancestral sequences in their original representation, requiring no prior training data.

tools.name: Chronumental
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for estimating time trees from large phylogenies
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to estimate time trees from very large phylogenies, enabling scalable phylogenetic dating.
